markdown.markdown: ## Publications - Cieśla, M., Jankowiak, K., Pozdniakov, M., Gruszecka, J., Kapnoula, E. (in prep.). Neural markers of initial foreign language learning: Comparing orthography- and image-based inputs. - Morett, L., Cieśla, M., Bray, M., Hughes-Berheim, S., Emmorey, K., (2024). Feeling signs: Motor encoding enhances sign language learning in hearing adults. *Studies in Second Language Acquisition* ## Conferences - Architectures and Mechanisms for Language Processing (2024), Edinburgh, Scotland - Psychonomics (2023), San Francisco, California - European Society of Cognitive Psychology (2023), Porto, Portugal; - Architectures and Mechanisms for Language Processing (2023), Donostia-San Sebastian, Spain - Young Linguists Meeting Poznań (2023), Poznań, Poland - Alabama Speech Language Pathologist Informational Seminar (2020), Tuscaloosa, Alabama - University of Alabama URCA Conference (2019), Tuscaloosa, Alabama ## Study Visits - Faculty of English, Adam Mickiewicz University (2022-2023), Poznań, Poland - Basque Center on Cognition, Brain and Language, Spoken Language Research Group (2023), Donostia-San Sebastian, Spain ## Education Visits - Jülich Research Center, Institute for Neuroscience and Medicine (2019), Jülich, Germany; *Neuroimaging internship with Dr. Paola Mengotti* - University of Cologne (2019), Cologne, Germany; *Spring School: Language and Music in Cognition* ## Peer Reviewing - Bilingualism: Language and Cognition ## Teaching Experience - Psychometrics and Individual Differences (Master's)
